CREATE TABLE `legalities` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this legality',
  `format` TEXT COMMENT 'format of play; each value refers to different rules to play',
  `status` TEXT COMMENT '• legal
• banned
• restricted',
  `uuid` TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE `rulings` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this ruling',
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'date',
  `text` TEXT COMMENT 'description about this ruling',
  `uuid` TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE `set_translations` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this set',
  `language` TEXT COMMENT 'language of this card',
  `setCode` TEXT COMMENT 'the set code for this set',
  `translation` TEXT COMMENT 'translation of this card'
);
CREATE TABLE `sets` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this set',
  `baseSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The number of cards in the set.',
  `block` TEXT COMMENT 'The block name the set was in.',
  `booster` TEXT COMMENT 'A breakdown of possibilities and weights of cards in a booster pack.',
  `code` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set.',
  `isFoilOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in foil.',
  `isForeignOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is available only outside the United States of America.',
  `isNonFoilOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in non-foil.',
  `isOnlineOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in online game variations.',
  `isPartialPreview` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is still in preview (spoiled). Preview sets do not have complete data.',
  `keyruneCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The matching Keyrune code for set image icons.',
  `mcmId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The Magic Card Marketset identifier.',
  `mcmIdExtras` BIGINT COMMENT 'The split Magic Card Market set identifier if a set is printed in two sets. This identifier represents the second sets identifier.',
  `mcmName` TEXT,
  `mtgoCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online; commonsense evidence:
if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'The name of the set.',
  `parentCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.',
  `releaseDate` TEXT COMMENT 'The release date in ISO 8601 format for the set.',
  `tcgplayerGroupId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The group identifier of the set on TCGplayer',
  `totalSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The total number of cards in the set, including promotional and related supplemental products but excluding Alchemy modifications - however those cards are included in the set itself.',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The expansion type of the set.; "alchemy", "archenemy", "arsenal", "box", "commander", "core", "draft_innovation", "duel_deck", "expansion", "from_the_vault", "funny", "masterpiece", "masters", "memorabilia", "planechase", "premium_deck", "promo", "spellbook", "starter", "token", "treasure_chest", "vanguard"'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
How many cards with original type of "Summon - Angel" have subtype other than "Angel"?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`id`)
FROM `cards`
WHERE
  `originalType` = 'Summon - Angel' AND `subtypes` <> 'Angel'

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `cards` (

cardKingdomFoilId, when paired with cardKingdomId that is not Null, is incredibly powerful.',

  `edhrecRank` BIGINT COMMENT 'The card rank on EDHRec',
  `faceConvertedManaCost` DOUBLE COMMENT 'The converted mana cost or mana value for the face for either half or part of the card.; if value is higher, it means that this card cost more converted mana for the face',
  `faceName` TEXT COMMENT 'The name on the face of the card.',
  `flavorName` TEXT COMMENT 'The promotional card name printed above the true card name on special cards that has no game function.; The promotional card name printed above the true card name on special cards that has no game function.',
  `flavorText` TEXT COMMENT 'The italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.; The italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.',
  `frameEffects` TEXT COMMENT 'The visual frame effects.; "colorshifted", "companion", "compasslanddfc", "devoid", "draft", "etched", "extendedart", "fullart", "inverted", "legendary", "lesson", "miracle", "mooneldrazidfc", "nyxtouched", "originpwdfc", "showcase", "snow", "sunmoondfc", "textless", "tombstone", "waxingandwaningmoondfc"',
  `frameVersion` TEXT COMMENT 'The version of the card frame style.; "1993", "1997", "2003", "2015", "future"',
  `hand` TEXT COMMENT 'The starting maximum hand size total modifier.; A + or - character precedes an integer. 
commonsense evidence:
positive maximum hand size: +1, +2, ....
negative maximum hand size: -1, ....
neural maximum hand size: 0....',

commonsense evidence:
Cards with this property may have missing or degraded properties and values.',

  `hasNonFoil` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the card can be found in non-foil; 0: cannot be found 1: can be found',

  `isFullArt` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the card has full artwork.; 0: doesnt have, 1: has full artwork',

  `isOversized` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the card is oversized.; 0: is not 1: is',

  `isStorySpotlight` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the card is a Story Spotlight card.; 0: is not 1: is',
  `isTextless` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the card does not have a text box.; commonsense evidence:
0: has a text box;
1: doesnt have a text box;',
  `isTimeshifted` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the card is time shifted; commonsense evidence:
If the card is "timeshifted", a feature of certain sets where a card will have a different frameVersion.',

  `life` TEXT COMMENT 'The starting life total modifier. A plus or minus character precedes an integer.',
  `loyalty` TEXT COMMENT 'The starting loyalty value of the card.; Used only on cards with "Planeswalker" in its types. empty means unkown',
  `manaCost` TEXT COMMENT 'The mana cost of the card wrapped in brackets for each value.; commonsense evidence:
manaCost is unconverted mana cost',

  `number` TEXT COMMENT 'The number of the card',
  `originalReleaseDate` TEXT COMMENT 'original Release Date; The original release date in ISO 8601(opens new window) format for a promotional card printed outside of a cycle window, such as Secret Lair Drop promotions.',
  `originalText` TEXT COMMENT 'original Text; The text on the card as originally printed.',
  `originalType` TEXT COMMENT 'original Type; The type of the card as originally printed. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.',
  `otherFaceIds` TEXT COMMENT 'other Face Ids; A list of card UUIDs to this cards counterparts, such as transformed or melded faces.',
  `power` TEXT COMMENT 'The power of the card.; commonsense evidence:
∞ means infinite power
null or * refers to unknown power',
  `printings` TEXT COMMENT 'A list of set printing codes the card was printed in, formatted in uppercase.',
  `promoTypes` TEXT COMMENT 'A list of promotional types for a card.; "arenaleague", "boosterfun", "boxtopper", "brawldeck", "bundle", "buyabox", "convention", "datestamped", "draculaseries", "draftweekend", "duels", "event", "fnm", "gameday", "gateway", "giftbox", "gilded", "godzillaseries", "instore", "intropack", "jpwalker", "judgegift", "league", "mediainsert", "neonink", "openhouse", "planeswalkerstamped", "playerrewards", "playpromo", "premiereshop", "prerelease", "promopack", "release", "setpromo", "stamped", "textured", "themepack", "thick", "tourney", "wizardsplaynetwork"',
  `purchaseUrls` TEXT COMMENT 'Links that navigate to websites where the card can be purchased.',

  `scryfallIllustrationId` TEXT COMMENT 'NOT USEFUL',

  `setCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The set printing code that the card is from.',

commonsense evidence:
if this value is empty, then it means this card doesnt have multiple faces on the same card.',
  `subtypes` TEXT COMMENT 'A list of card subtypes found after em-dash.',
  `supertypes` TEXT COMMENT 'A list of card supertypes found before em-dash.; commonsense evidence:
list of all types should be the union of subtypes and supertypes',

  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The type of the card as visible, including any supertypes and subtypes.; "Artifact", "Card", "Conspiracy", "Creature", "Dragon", "Dungeon", "Eaturecray", "Elemental", "Elite", "Emblem", "Enchantment", "Ever", "Goblin", "Hero", "Instant", "Jaguar", "Knights", "Land", "Phenomenon", "Plane", "Planeswalker", "Scariest", "Scheme", "See", "Sorcery", "Sticker", "Summon", "Token", "Tribal", "Vanguard", "Wolf", "You’ll", "instant"',

);
CREATE TABLE `foreign_data` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id number identifying this row of data',
  `flavorText` TEXT COMMENT 'The foreign flavor text of the card.',
  `language` TEXT COMMENT 'The foreign language of card.',
  `multiverseid` BIGINT COMMENT 'The foreign multiverse identifier of the card.',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'The foreign name of the card.',
  `text` TEXT COMMENT 'The foreign text ruling of the card.',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The foreign type of the card. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.',
  `uuid` TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE `legalities` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this legality',
  `format` TEXT COMMENT 'format of play; each value refers to different rules to play',
  `status` TEXT COMMENT '• legal
• banned
• restricted',
  `uuid` TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE `rulings` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this ruling',
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'date',
  `text` TEXT COMMENT 'description about this ruling',
  `uuid` TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE `set_translations` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this set',
  `language` TEXT COMMENT 'language of this card',
  `setCode` TEXT COMMENT 'the set code for this set',
  `translation` TEXT COMMENT 'translation of this card'
);
CREATE TABLE `sets` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this set',
  `baseSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The number of cards in the set.',
  `block` TEXT COMMENT 'The block name the set was in.',
  `booster` TEXT COMMENT 'A breakdown of possibilities and weights of cards in a booster pack.',
  `code` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set.',
  `isFoilOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in foil.',
  `isForeignOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is available only outside the United States of America.',
  `isNonFoilOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in non-foil.',
  `isOnlineOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in online game variations.',
  `isPartialPreview` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is still in preview (spoiled). Preview sets do not have complete data.',
  `keyruneCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The matching Keyrune code for set image icons.',
  `mcmId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The Magic Card Marketset identifier.',
  `mcmIdExtras` BIGINT COMMENT 'The split Magic Card Market set identifier if a set is printed in two sets. This identifier represents the second sets identifier.',
  `mcmName` TEXT,
  `mtgoCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online; commonsense evidence:
if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'The name of the set.',
  `parentCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.',
  `releaseDate` TEXT COMMENT 'The release date in ISO 8601 format for the set.',
  `tcgplayerGroupId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The group identifier of the set on TCGplayer',
  `totalSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The total number of cards in the set, including promotional and related supplemental products but excluding Alchemy modifications - however those cards are included in the set itself.',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The expansion type of the set.; "alchemy", "archenemy", "arsenal", "box", "commander", "core", "draft_innovation", "duel_deck", "expansion", "from_the_vault", "funny", "masterpiece", "masters", "memorabilia", "planechase", "premium_deck", "promo", "spellbook", "starter", "token", "treasure_chest", "vanguard"'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
How many of the banned cards are white border?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`status` = 'Banned' AND `T1`.`borderColor` = 'white'

SELECT DISTINCT

FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `foreign_data` AS `T2`

WHERE

【用户问题】
What is the mana cost of cards with a normal layout, a 2003 frame version, with a black border color, and available in paper and mtgo?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `manaCost`
FROM `cards`
WHERE
  `availability` = 'mtgo,paper'
  AND `borderColor` = 'black'
  AND `frameVersion` = 2003
  AND `layout` = 'normal'

  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `isTextless` = 0  AND `isStorySpotlight` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`id`)
FROM `cards`

);

  `booster` TEXT COMMENT 'A breakdown of possibilities and weights of cards in a booster pack.',
  `code` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set.',

  `mtgoCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online; commonsense evidence:
if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'The name of the set.',
  `parentCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.',
  `releaseDate` TEXT COMMENT 'The release date in ISO 8601 format for the set.',
  `tcgplayerGroupId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The group identifier of the set on TCGplayer',
  `totalSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The total number of cards in the set, including promotional and related supplemental products but excluding Alchemy modifications - however those cards are included in the set itself.',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The expansion type of the set.; "alchemy", "archenemy", "arsenal", "box", "commander", "core", "draft_innovation", "duel_deck", "expansion", "from_the_vault", "funny", "masterpiece", "masters", "memorabilia", "planechase", "premium_deck", "promo", "spellbook", "starter", "token", "treasure_chest", "vanguard"'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
How many Brazilian Portuguese translated sets are inside the Commander block?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`code` = `T2`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`language` = 'Portuguese (Brazil)' AND `T1`.`block` = 'Commander'

【用户问题】
How many unknown power cards contain info about the triggered ability

```sql
output:
SELECT
  Count(DISTINCT `T1`.`id`) 
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `rulings` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  (
    `T1`.`power` IS NULL OR `T1`.`power` = '*'
  )
  AND `T2`.`text` LIKE '%triggered ability%'

INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
INNER JOIN `rulings` AS `T3`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T3`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`format` = 'premodern'
  AND `T3`.`text` = 'This is a triggered mana ability.'
  AND `T1`.`Side` IS NULL

【用户问题】
What is the foreign name of the card in French of type Creature, normal layout and black border color, by artist Matthew D. Wilson?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `name`
FROM `foreign_data`
WHERE
  `uuid` IN (
    SELECT
      `uuid`
    FROM `cards`
    WHERE
      `types` = 'Creature'
      AND `layout` = 'normal'
      AND `borderColor` = 'black'
      AND `artist` = 'Matthew D. Wilson'
  )
  AND `language` = 'French'

【用户问题】
What percentage of cards with format commander and legal status do not have a content warning?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T1`.`hasContentWarning` = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`format` = 'commander' AND `T2`.`status` = 'Legal'

【用户问题】
What percentage of cards without power are in French?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T2`.`language` = 'French' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `foreign_data` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`power` IS NULL OR `T1`.`power` = '*'

What proportion of cards do not have a text box with a normal layout?

【用户问题】
What languages are available in the set known as Archenemy on the magic card market and having the code ARC?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`language`
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`code` = `T2`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`mcmName` = 'Archenemy' AND `T2`.`setCode` = 'ARC'

What's the Italian name of the set of cards with "Ancestor's Chosen" is in?

【用户问题】
For the set of cards with "Ancestor's Chosen" in it, is there a Korean version of it?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(
      CASE
        WHEN `T2`.`language` = 'Korean' AND NOT `T2`.`translation` IS NULL
        THEN 1
        ELSE 0
      END
    ) > 0
    THEN 'YES'
    ELSE 'NO'
  END
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Ancestor''s Chosen'

【用户问题】
Among the cards in the set "Hauptset Zehnte Edition", how many of them are designed by Adam Rex?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`translation` = 'Hauptset Zehnte Edition' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Adam Rex'

【用户问题】
Did the set of cards with "Angel of Mercy" appear on Magic: The Gathering Online?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CASE WHEN NOT `T2`.`mtgoCode` IS NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Angel of Mercy'

【用户问题】
Among the sets in the block "Ice Age", how many of them have an Italian translation?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT `T1`.`id`)
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`code`
WHERE
  `T1`.`block` = 'Ice Age'
  AND `T2`.`language` = 'Italian'
  AND NOT `T2`.`translation` IS NULL

【用户问题】
Is the set of cards with Adarkar Valkyrie only available outside the United States?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CASE WHEN `isForeignOnly` = 1 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Adarkar Valkyrie'

【用户问题】
Among the sets of cards that have an Italian translation, how many of them have a base set number of under 100?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`code`
WHERE
  NOT `T2`.`translation` IS NULL
  AND `T1`.`baseSetSize` < 100
  AND `T2`.`language` = 'Italian'

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Which of these artists have designed a card in the set Coldsnap, Jeremy Jarvis, Aaron Miller or Chippy?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`artist`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  (
    `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Chippy'
  )
  OR (
    `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Aaron Miller'
  )
  OR (
    `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Jeremy Jarvis'
  )
GROUP BY
  `T1`.`artist`

【用户问题】
Among the cards with converted mana cost higher than 5 in the set Coldsnap, how many of them have unknown power?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  SUM(CASE WHEN `T1`.`power` = '*' OR `T1`.`power` IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`convertedManaCost` > 5

  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'date',

);
CREATE TABLE `set_translations` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this set',

  `setCode` TEXT COMMENT 'the set code for this set',
  `translation` TEXT COMMENT 'translation of this card'
);
CREATE TABLE `sets` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique id identifying this set',
  `baseSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The number of cards in the set.',
  `block` TEXT COMMENT 'The block name the set was in.',
  `booster` TEXT COMMENT 'A breakdown of possibilities and weights of cards in a booster pack.',
  `code` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set.',
  `isFoilOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in foil.',
  `isForeignOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is available only outside the United States of America.',
  `isNonFoilOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in non-foil.',
  `isOnlineOnly` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is only available in online game variations.',
  `isPartialPreview` BIGINT COMMENT 'If the set is still in preview (spoiled). Preview sets do not have complete data.',
  `keyruneCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The matching Keyrune code for set image icons.',
  `mcmId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The Magic Card Marketset identifier.',
  `mcmIdExtras` BIGINT COMMENT 'The split Magic Card Market set identifier if a set is printed in two sets. This identifier represents the second sets identifier.',
  `mcmName` TEXT,
  `mtgoCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online; commonsense evidence:
if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'The name of the set.',
  `parentCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.',
  `releaseDate` TEXT COMMENT 'The release date in ISO 8601 format for the set.',
  `tcgplayerGroupId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The group identifier of the set on TCGplayer',
  `totalSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The total number of cards in the set, including promotional and related supplemental products but excluding Alchemy modifications - however those cards are included in the set itself.',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The expansion type of the set.; "alchemy", "archenemy", "arsenal", "box", "commander", "core", "draft_innovation", "duel_deck", "expansion", "from_the_vault", "funny", "masterpiece", "masters", "memorabilia", "planechase", "premium_deck", "promo", "spellbook", "starter", "token", "treasure_chest", "vanguard"'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Please list the Italian names of the cards in the set Coldsnap with the highest converted mana cost.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`name`
FROM `foreign_data` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `cards` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`uuid` = `T1`.`uuid`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T3`
  ON `T3`.`code` = `T2`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T3`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`language` = 'Italian'
ORDER BY
  `T2`.`convertedManaCost` DESC

What is the percentage of the cards with a converted mana cost of 7 in the set Coldsnap?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T1`.`convertedManaCost` = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap'

);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
What is the percentage of incredibly powerful cards in the set Coldsnap?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN NOT `T1`.`cardKingdomFoilId` IS NULL AND NOT `T1`.`cardKingdomId` IS NULL
      THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap'

Which of the play format has the highest number of banned status? Indicate the play format and the names of all the card meet the condition.

```sql
output: SELECT T2.format, T1.name FROM cards AS T1 INNER JOIN legalities AS T2 ON T2.uuid = T1.uuid INNER JOIN ( SELECT format FROM legalities WHERE status = 'Banned' GROUP BY format ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS MaxBanned ON MaxBanned.format = T2.format WHERE T2.status = 'Banned'

);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Which cards are ranked 1st on EDHRec? List all of the cards name and its banned play format.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`name`,
  `T2`.`format`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`uuid` = `T1`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`edhrecRank` = 1 AND `T2`.`status` = 'Banned'
GROUP BY
  `T1`.`name`,
  `T2`.`format`

【用户问题】
List the names of all the cards in the set Hour of Devastation and find the formats in which these cards are legal.

```sql
output:
SELECT DISTINCT
  `T2`.`name`,
  CASE WHEN `T1`.`status` = 'Legal' THEN `T1`.`format` ELSE NULL END
FROM `legalities` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `cards` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`uuid` = `T1`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`setCode` IN (
    SELECT
      `code`
    FROM `sets`
    WHERE
      `name` = 'Hour of Devastation'
  )

【用户问题】
List all the frame styles and cards Allen Williams worked on and find any banned cards if there are any.

```sql
output:
SELECT DISTINCT
  `T1`.`frameVersion`,
  `T1`.`name`,
  CASE WHEN `T2`.`status` = 'Banned' THEN `T1`.`name` ELSE 'NO' END
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`artist` = 'Allen Williams'

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
What is the most common bond type?

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon
 h: hydrogen
 o: oxygen
 s: sulfur
 n: nitrogen
 p: phosphorus
 na: sodium
 br: bromine
 f: fluorine
 i: iodine
 sn: Tin
 pb: lead
 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
What is the most common bond type?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T`.`bond_type`
FROM (
  SELECT
    `bond_type`,
    COUNT(`bond_id`)
  FROM `bond`
  GROUP BY
    `bond_type`
  ORDER BY
    COUNT(`bond_id`) DESC
  LIMIT 1
) AS `T`

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
Calculate the average number of oxygen atoms in single-bonded molecules.

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon
 h: hydrogen
 o: oxygen
 s: sulfur
 n: nitrogen
 p: phosphorus
 na: sodium
 br: bromine
 f: fluorine
 i: iodine
 sn: Tin
 pb: lead
 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Calculate the average number of oxygen atoms in single-bonded molecules.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  AVG(`oxygen_count`)
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T1`.`element`) AS `oxygen_count`
  FROM `atom` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `bond` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T2`.`bond_type` = '-' AND `T1`.`element` = 'o'
  GROUP BY
    `T1`.`molecule_id`
) AS `oxygen_counts`

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
On average how many carcinogenic molecules are single bonded?

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon
 h: hydrogen
 o: oxygen
 s: sulfur
 n: nitrogen
 p: phosphorus
 na: sodium
 br: bromine
 f: fluorine
 i: iodine
 sn: Tin
 pb: lead
 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
On average how many carcinogenic molecules are single bonded?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  AVG(`single_bond_count`)
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T3`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T1`.`bond_type`) AS `single_bond_count`
  FROM `bond` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `atom` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  INNER JOIN `molecule` AS `T3`
    ON `T3`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T1`.`bond_type` = '-' AND `T3`.`label` = '+'
  GROUP BY
    `T3`.`molecule_id`
) AS `subquery`

 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);

TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',

#: triple bond'

);

Which type of label is the most numerous in atoms with hydrogen?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T`.`label`
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T2`.`label`,
    COUNT(`T2`.`molecule_id`)
  FROM `atom` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `molecule` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T1`.`element` = 'h'
  GROUP BY
    `T2`.`label`
  ORDER BY

) AS `t`

 ca: Calcium'
);

A1 and A2 refers to which atom',

#: triple bond'

- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',

);

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T`.`bond_type`
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`bond_type`,
    COUNT(`T1`.`molecule_id`)
  FROM `bond` AS `T1`
  WHERE
    `T1`.`molecule_id` = 'TR010'
  GROUP BY
    `T1`.`bond_type`
  ORDER BY
    COUNT(`T1`.`molecule_id`) DESC
  LIMIT 1
) AS `T`

SELECT

 sn: Tin

 ca: Calcium'
);

  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',

-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);

【用户问题】
Is the molecule with the most double bonds carcinogenic?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`label`
FROM `molecule` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    `T`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T`.`bond_type`)
  FROM `bond` AS `T`
  WHERE
    `T`.`bond_type` = '='
  GROUP BY
    `T`.`molecule_id`
  ORDER BY
    COUNT(`T`.`bond_type`) DESC
  LIMIT 1
) AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`

【用户问题】
What proportion of single bonds are carcinogenic? Please provide your answer as a percentage with five decimal places.

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon

 sn: Tin

 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);

  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (

- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【用户问题】
What proportion of single bonds are carcinogenic? Please provide your answer as a percentage with five decimal places.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN `T2`.`label` = '+' THEN `T1`.`bond_id` ELSE NULL END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`bond_id`),
    5
  )
FROM `bond` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `molecule` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
WHERE
  `T1`.`bond_type` = '-'

SELECT

  `T3`.`bond_type` = '#' AND `T1`.`element` IN ('p', 'br')

  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
What is the composition of element chlorine in percentage among the single bond molecules?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN `T`.`element` = 'cl' THEN `T`.`atom_id` ELSE NULL END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T`.`atom_id`)
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`atom_id`,
    `T1`.`element`
  FROM `atom` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `molecule` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  INNER JOIN `bond` AS `T3`
    ON `T2`.`molecule_id` = `T3`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T3`.`bond_type` = '-'
) AS `T`

Tally the toxicology element of the 4th atom of each molecule that was carcinogenic.

CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:

  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon

 p: phosphorus

 br: bromine
 f: fluorine

 sn: Tin
 pb: lead

 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',

#: triple bond'
);

);

  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',

);

Tally the toxicology element of the 4th atom of each molecule that was carcinogenic.

What is the ratio of Hydrogen elements in molecule ID TR006? List the ratio with its label.

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (

);

);

What is the ratio of Hydrogen elements in molecule ID TR006? List the ratio with its label.

```sql
output: WITH SubQuery AS (SELECT DISTINCT T1.atom_id, T1.element, T1.molecule_id, T2.label FROM atom AS T1 INNER JOIN molecule AS T2 ON T1.molecule_id = T2.molecule_id WHERE T2.molecule_id = 'TR006') SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN element = 'h' THEN atom_id ELSE NULL END) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) / NULLIF(COUNT(atom_id), 0) AS ratio, label FROM SubQuery GROUP BY label

input:

【用户问题】
Which non-carcinogenic molecules consisted more than 5 atoms?

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon
 h: hydrogen
 o: oxygen
 s: sulfur
 n: nitrogen
 p: phosphorus
 na: sodium
 br: bromine
 f: fluorine
 i: iodine
 sn: Tin
 pb: lead
 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Which non-carcinogenic molecules consisted more than 5 atoms?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T`.`molecule_id`
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T2`.`atom_id`)
  FROM `molecule` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `atom` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T1`.`label` = '-'
  GROUP BY
    `T1`.`molecule_id`
  HAVING
    COUNT(`T2`.`atom_id`) > 5
) AS `t`

CREATE TABLE `schools` (

【用户问题】
Please list the codes of the schools with a total enrollment of over 500.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`CDSCode`
FROM `schools` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `frpm` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`Enrollment (K-12)` + `T2`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)` > 500

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Among the schools with an SAT excellence rate of over 0.3, what is the highest eligible free rate for students aged 5-17?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  MAX(
    CAST(`T1`.`Free Meal Count (Ages 5-17)` AS DOUBLE) / `T1`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`
  )
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `satscores` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`cds`
WHERE
  CAST(`T2`.`NumGE1500` AS DOUBLE) / `T2`.`NumTstTakr` > 0.3

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Rank schools by their average score in Writing where the score is greater than 499, showing their charter numbers.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `CharterNum`,
  `AvgScrWrite`,
  RANK() OVER (ORDER BY `AvgScrWrite` DESC) AS `WritingScoreRank`
FROM `schools` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `satscores` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`cds`
WHERE
  `T2`.`AvgScrWrite` > 499 AND NOT `CharterNum` IS NULL

【用户问题】
List the names of schools with more than 30 difference in enrollements between K-12 and ages 5-17? Please also give the full street adress of the schools.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`School`,
  `T1`.`Street`
FROM `schools` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `frpm` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`Enrollment (K-12)` - `T2`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)` > 30

【用户问题】
Give the names of the schools with the percent eligible for free meals in K-12 is more than 0.1 and test takers whose test score is greater than or equal to 1500?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School Name`
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `frpm` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  CAST(`T2`.`Free Meal Count (K-12)` AS DOUBLE) / `T2`.`Enrollment (K-12)` > 0.1
  AND `T1`.`NumGE1500` > 0

【用户问题】
Name schools in Riverside which the average of average math score for SAT is grater than 400, what is the funding type of these schools?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`sname`,
  `T2`.`Charter Funding Type`
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `frpm` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`District Name` LIKE 'Riverside%'
GROUP BY
  `T1`.`sname`,
  `T2`.`Charter Funding Type`
HAVING
  CAST(SUM(`T1`.`AvgScrMath`) AS DOUBLE) / COUNT(`T1`.`cds`) > 400

State the names and full communication address of high schools in Monterey which has more than 800 free or reduced price meals for ages 15-17?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`School Name`,
  `T2`.`Street`,
  `T2`.`City`,
  `T2`.`State`,
  `T2`.`Zip`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`County` = 'Monterey'
  AND `T1`.`Free Meal Count (Ages 5-17)` > 800
  AND `T1`.`School Type` = 'High Schools (Public)'

【用户问题】
What is the average score in writing for the schools that were opened after 1991 or closed before 2000? List the school names along with the score. Also, list the communication number of the schools if there is any.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School`,
  `T1`.`AvgScrWrite`,
  `T2`.`Phone`
FROM `schools` AS `T2`
LEFT JOIN `satscores` AS `T1`
  ON `T2`.`CDSCode` = `T1`.`cds`
WHERE
  DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`OpenDate` AS DATETIME), '%Y') > '1991'
  OR DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`ClosedDate` AS DATETIME), '%Y') < '2000'

【用户问题】
Consider the average difference between K-12 enrollment and 15-17 enrollment of schools that are locally funded, list the names and DOC type of schools which has a difference above this average.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School`,
  `T2`.`DOC`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`FundingType` = 'Locally funded'
  AND (
    `T1`.`Enrollment (K-12)` - `T1`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`
  ) > (
    SELECT
      AVG(`T3`.`Enrollment (K-12)` - `T3`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`)
    FROM `frpm` AS `T3`
    INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T4`
      ON `T3`.`CDSCode` = `T4`.`CDSCode`
    WHERE
      `T4`.`FundingType` = 'Locally funded'
  )

【用户问题】
What is the eligible free or reduced price meal rate for the top 5 schools in grades 1-12 with the highest free or reduced price meal count of the schools with the ownership code 66?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(`T1`.`FRPM Count (K-12)` AS DOUBLE) / `T1`.`Enrollment (K-12)`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`SOC` = 66
ORDER BY
  `T1`.`FRPM Count (K-12)` DESC
LIMIT 5

【用户问题】
What is the average number of test takers from Fresno schools that opened between 1/1/1980 and 12/31/1980?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  AVG(`T1`.`NumTstTakr`)
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`OpenDate` AS DATETIME), '%Y') = '1980'
  AND `T2`.`County` = 'Fresno'

output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`Phone`
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE

ORDER BY
  `T1`.`AvgScrRead` ASC
LIMIT 1

【用户问题】
List the names of virtual schools that are among the top 5 in their respective counties based on average reading scores.

```sql
output: SELECT  School FROM ( SELECT T2.School, T1.AvgScrRead, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY T2.County ORDER BY T1.AvgScrRead DESC) AS rnk FROM satscores AS T1 INNER JOIN schools AS T2 ON T1.cds = T2.CDSCode WHERE T2.Virtual = 'F') ranked_schools WHERE rnk <= 5

【用户问题】
What is the average writing score of each of the schools managed by Ricci Ulrich? List the schools and the corresponding average writing scores.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School`,
  `T1`.`AvgScrWrite`
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`AdmFName1` = 'Ricci' AND `T2`.`AdmLName1` = 'Ulrich'

【用户问题】
Which state special schools have the highest number of enrollees from grades 1 through 12?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`DOC` = 31
ORDER BY
  `T1`.`Enrollment (K-12)` DESC
LIMIT 1

What is the monthly average number of schools that opened in Alameda County under the jurisdiction of the Elementary School District in 1980?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(COUNT(`School`) AS DOUBLE) / 12
FROM `schools`
WHERE
  `DOC` = 52
  AND `County` = 'Alameda'
  AND DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`OpenDate` AS DATETIME), '%Y') = '1980'

【用户问题】
What is the ratio of merged Unified School District schools in Orange County to merged Elementary School District schools?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `DOC` = 54 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(CASE WHEN `DOC` = 52 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM `schools`
WHERE
  `StatusType` = 'Merged' AND `County` = 'Orange'

【用户问题】
What is the postal street address for the school with the 7th highest Math average? Indicate the school's name.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`MailStreet`,
  `T2`.`School`
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
ORDER BY
  `T1`.`AvgScrMath` DESC
LIMIT 1
OFFSET 6

【用户问题】
What is the total number of non-chartered schools in the county of Los Angeles with a percent (%) of eligible free meals for grades 1 through 12 that is less than 0.18%?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T2`.`School`)
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`County` = 'Los Angeles'
  AND `T2`.`Charter` = 0
  AND CAST(`T1`.`Free Meal Count (K-12)` AS DOUBLE) * 100 / `T1`.`Enrollment (K-12)` < 0.18

SELECT

FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`

  AND `T1`.`Academic Year` BETWEEN 2014 AND 2015

【用户问题】
Which schools served a grade span of Kindergarten to 9th grade in the county of Los Angeles and what is its Percent (%) Eligible FRPM (Ages 5-17)?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School`,
  `T1`.`FRPM Count (Ages 5-17)` * 100 / `T1`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`County` = 'Los Angeles' AND `T2`.`GSserved` = 'K-9'

【用户问题】
Between San Diego and Santa Barbara, which county offers the most number of schools that does not offer physical building? Indicate the amount.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `County`,
  COUNT(`Virtual`)
FROM `schools`
WHERE
  (
    `County` = 'San Diego' OR `County` = 'Santa Barbara'
  ) AND `Virtual` = 'F'
GROUP BY
  `County`
ORDER BY
  COUNT(`Virtual`) DESC
LIMIT 1

【用户问题】
Of the schools that offers a magnet program serving a grade span of Kindergarten to 8th grade, how many offers Multiple Provision Types? List the number of cities that offers a Kindergarten to 8th grade span and indicate how many schools are there serving such grade span for each city.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`City`,
  COUNT(`T2`.`CDSCode`)
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`Magnet` = 1
  AND `T2`.`GSoffered` = 'K-8'
  AND `T1`.`NSLP Provision Status` = 'Multiple Provision Types'
GROUP BY
  `T2`.`City`

【用户问题】
What is the Percent (%) Eligible Free (K-12) in the school administered by an administrator whose first name is Alusine. List the district code of the school.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`Free Meal Count (K-12)` * 100 / `T1`.`Enrollment (K-12)`,
  `T1`.`District Code`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`AdmFName1` = 'Alusine'

【用户问题】
What are the valid e-mail addresses of the administrator of the school located in the San Bernardino county, City of San Bernardino City Unified that opened between 1/1/2009 to 12/31/2010 whose school types are public Intermediate/Middle Schools and Unified Schools?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`AdmEmail1`,
  `T2`.`AdmEmail2`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`County` = 'San Bernardino'
  AND `T2`.`City` = 'San Bernardino'
  AND `T2`.`DOC` = 54
  AND DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`OpenDate` AS DATETIME), '%Y') BETWEEN '2009' AND '2010'
  AND `T2`.`SOC` = 62

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
How many accounts who choose issuance after transaction are staying in East Bohemia region?

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `account` (
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the account',
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch',
  `frequency` TEXT COMMENT 'frequency of the acount',
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the account; in the form YYMMDD'
);
CREATE TABLE `card` (
  `card_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of credit card',
  `disp_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'disposition id',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of credit card; "junior": junior class of credit card; 
"classic": standard class of credit card; 
"gold": high-level credit card',
  `issued` TEXT COMMENT 'the date when the credit card issued; in the form YYMMDD'
);
CREATE TABLE `client` (
  `client_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique number',
  `gender` TEXT COMMENT 'F：female 
M：male',
  `birth_date` TEXT COMMENT 'birth date',
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch'
);
CREATE TABLE `disp` (
  `disp_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique number of identifying this row of record',
  `client_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of client',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of account',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of disposition; "OWNER" : "USER" : "DISPONENT"
commonsense evidence:
the account can only have the right to issue permanent orders or apply for loans'
);
CREATE TABLE `district` (
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch',
  `A2` TEXT COMMENT 'district_name',
  `A3` TEXT COMMENT 'region',
  `A4` TEXT,
  `A5` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A6` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A7` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A8` BIGINT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A9` BIGINT COMMENT 'not useful',
  `A10` DOUBLE COMMENT 'ratio of urban inhabitants',
  `A11` BIGINT COMMENT 'average salary',
  `A12` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1995',
  `A13` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1996',
  `A14` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of entrepreneurs per 1000 inhabitants',
  `A15` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1995',
  `A16` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1996'
);
CREATE TABLE `loan` (
  `loan_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id number identifying the loan data',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id number identifying the account',
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'the date when the loan is approved',
  `amount` BIGINT COMMENT 'approved amount; unit：US dollar',
  `duration` BIGINT COMMENT 'loan duration; unit：month',
  `payments` DOUBLE COMMENT 'monthly payments; unit：month',
  `status` TEXT COMMENT 'repayment status; A stands for contract finished, no problems;
B stands for contract finished, loan not paid;
C stands for running contract, OK so far;
D stands for running contract, client in debt'
);
CREATE TABLE `order` (
  `order_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'identifying the unique order',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of account',
  `bank_to` TEXT COMMENT 'bank of the recipient',
  `account_to` BIGINT COMMENT 'account of the recipient; each bank has unique two-letter code',
  `amount` DOUBLE COMMENT 'debited amount',
  `k_symbol` TEXT COMMENT 'purpose of the payment; "POJISTNE" stands for insurance payment
"SIPO" stands for household payment
"LEASING" stands for leasing
"UVER" stands for loan payment'
);
CREATE TABLE `trans` (
  `trans_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'transaction id',
  `account_id` BIGINT,
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'date of transaction',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT '+/- transaction; "PRIJEM" stands for credit
"VYDAJ" stands for withdrawal',
  `operation` TEXT COMMENT 'mode of transaction; "VYBER KARTOU": credit card withdrawal
"VKLAD": credit in cash
"PREVOD Z UCTU" :collection from another bank
"VYBER": withdrawal in cash
"PREVOD NA UCET": remittance to another bank',
  `amount` BIGINT COMMENT 'amount of money; Unit：USD',
  `balance` BIGINT COMMENT 'balance after transaction; Unit：USD',
  `k_symbol` TEXT COMMENT '"POJISTNE": stands for insurrance payment
"SLUZBY": stands for payment for statement
"UROK": stands for interest credited
"SANKC. UROK": sanction interest if negative balance
"SIPO": stands for household
"DUCHOD": stands for old-age pension
"UVER": stands for loan payment',
  `bank` TEXT COMMENT 'each bank has unique two-letter code',
  `account` BIGINT
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
How many accounts who choose issuance after transaction are staying in East Bohemia region?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T2`.`account_id`)
FROM `district` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `account` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`district_id` = `T2`.`district_id`
WHERE
  `T1`.`A3` = 'east Bohemia' AND `T2`.`frequency` = 'POPLATEK PO OBRATU'

SELECT

    WHERE
      `gender` = 'F'
    ORDER BY
      `birth_date` ASC
    LIMIT 1
  )
ORDER BY
  `T2`.`A11` DESC
LIMIT 1

【用户问题】
Among the accounts who have loan validity more than 12 months, list out the accounts that have the highest approved amount and have account opening date in 1993.

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `account` (
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the account',
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch',
  `frequency` TEXT COMMENT 'frequency of the acount',
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the account; in the form YYMMDD'
);
CREATE TABLE `card` (
  `card_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of credit card',
  `disp_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'disposition id',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of credit card; "junior": junior class of credit card; 
"classic": standard class of credit card; 
"gold": high-level credit card',
  `issued` TEXT COMMENT 'the date when the credit card issued; in the form YYMMDD'
);
CREATE TABLE `client` (
  `client_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique number',
  `gender` TEXT COMMENT 'F：female 
M：male',
  `birth_date` TEXT COMMENT 'birth date',
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch'
);
CREATE TABLE `disp` (
  `disp_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique number of identifying this row of record',
  `client_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of client',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of account',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of disposition; "OWNER" : "USER" : "DISPONENT"
commonsense evidence:
the account can only have the right to issue permanent orders or apply for loans'
);
CREATE TABLE `district` (
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch',
  `A2` TEXT COMMENT 'district_name',
  `A3` TEXT COMMENT 'region',
  `A4` TEXT,
  `A5` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A6` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A7` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A8` BIGINT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A9` BIGINT COMMENT 'not useful',
  `A10` DOUBLE COMMENT 'ratio of urban inhabitants',
  `A11` BIGINT COMMENT 'average salary',
  `A12` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1995',
  `A13` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1996',
  `A14` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of entrepreneurs per 1000 inhabitants',
  `A15` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1995',
  `A16` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1996'
);
CREATE TABLE `loan` (
  `loan_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id number identifying the loan data',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id number identifying the account',
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'the date when the loan is approved',
  `amount` BIGINT COMMENT 'approved amount; unit：US dollar',
  `duration` BIGINT COMMENT 'loan duration; unit：month',
  `payments` DOUBLE COMMENT 'monthly payments; unit：month',
  `status` TEXT COMMENT 'repayment status; A stands for contract finished, no problems;
B stands for contract finished, loan not paid;
C stands for running contract, OK so far;
D stands for running contract, client in debt'
);
CREATE TABLE `order` (
  `order_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'identifying the unique order',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of account',
  `bank_to` TEXT COMMENT 'bank of the recipient',
  `account_to` BIGINT COMMENT 'account of the recipient; each bank has unique two-letter code',
  `amount` DOUBLE COMMENT 'debited amount',
  `k_symbol` TEXT COMMENT 'purpose of the payment; "POJISTNE" stands for insurance payment
"SIPO" stands for household payment
"LEASING" stands for leasing
"UVER" stands for loan payment'
);
CREATE TABLE `trans` (
  `trans_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'transaction id',
  `account_id` BIGINT,
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'date of transaction',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT '+/- transaction; "PRIJEM" stands for credit
"VYDAJ" stands for withdrawal',
  `operation` TEXT COMMENT 'mode of transaction; "VYBER KARTOU": credit card withdrawal
"VKLAD": credit in cash
"PREVOD Z UCTU" :collection from another bank
"VYBER": withdrawal in cash
"PREVOD NA UCET": remittance to another bank',
  `amount` BIGINT COMMENT 'amount of money; Unit：USD',
  `balance` BIGINT COMMENT 'balance after transaction; Unit：USD',
  `k_symbol` TEXT COMMENT '"POJISTNE": stands for insurrance payment
"SLUZBY": stands for payment for statement
"UROK": stands for interest credited
"SANKC. UROK": sanction interest if negative balance
"SIPO": stands for household
"DUCHOD": stands for old-age pension
"UVER": stands for loan payment',
  `bank` TEXT COMMENT 'each bank has unique two-letter code',
  `account` BIGINT
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Among the accounts who have loan validity more than 12 months, list out the accounts that have the highest approved amount and have account opening date in 1993.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`account_id`
FROM `loan` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `account` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`account_id` = `T2`.`account_id`
WHERE
  DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`date` AS DATETIME), '%Y') = '1993'
  AND `T1`.`duration` > 12
ORDER BY
  `T1`.`amount` DESC
LIMIT 1

【用户问题】

SELECT

【用户问题】
For the client whose loan was approved first in 1993/7/5, what is the increase rate of his/her account balance from 1993/3/22 to 1998/12/27?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST((
    SUM(CASE WHEN `T3`.`date` = '1998-12-27' THEN `T3`.`balance` ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN `T3`.`date` = '1993-03-22' THEN `T3`.`balance` ELSE 0 END)
  ) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / SUM(CASE WHEN `T3`.`date` = '1993-03-22' THEN `T3`.`balance` ELSE 0 END)
FROM `loan` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `account` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`account_id` = `T2`.`account_id`
INNER JOIN `trans` AS `T3`
  ON `T3`.`account_id` = `T2`.`account_id`
WHERE
  `T1`.`date` = '1993-07-05'

【用户问题】
Between 1/1/1995 and 12/31/1997, how many loans in the amount of at least 250,000 per account that chose monthly statement issuance were approved?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`account_id`)
FROM `account` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `loan` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`account_id` = `T2`.`account_id`
WHERE

  AND `T1`.`frequency` = 'POPLATEK MESICNE'
  AND `T2`.`amount` >= 250000

);
CREATE TABLE `client` (
  `client_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique number',

M：male',
  `birth_date` TEXT COMMENT 'birth date',
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch'
);
CREATE TABLE `disp` (
  `disp_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique number of identifying this row of record',

  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of disposition; "OWNER" : "USER" : "DISPONENT"
commonsense evidence:
the account can only have the right to issue permanent orders or apply for loans'
);
CREATE TABLE `district` (
  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch',
  `A2` TEXT COMMENT 'district_name',
  `A3` TEXT COMMENT 'region',
  `A4` TEXT,
  `A5` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A6` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A7` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A8` BIGINT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A9` BIGINT COMMENT 'not useful',
  `A10` DOUBLE COMMENT 'ratio of urban inhabitants',
  `A11` BIGINT COMMENT 'average salary',
  `A12` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1995',
  `A13` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1996',
  `A14` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of entrepreneurs per 1000 inhabitants',
  `A15` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1995',
  `A16` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1996'

CREATE TABLE `loan` (
  `loan_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id number identifying the loan data',

B stands for contract finished, loan not paid;

"SIPO" stands for household payment
"LEASING" stands for leasing

);

  `trans_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'transaction id',

  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'date of transaction',

"VYDAJ" stands for withdrawal',
  `operation` TEXT COMMENT 'mode of transaction; "VYBER KARTOU": credit card withdrawal
"VKLAD": credit in cash
"PREVOD Z UCTU" :collection from another bank
"VYBER": withdrawal in cash
"PREVOD NA UCET": remittance to another bank',
  `amount` BIGINT COMMENT 'amount of money; Unit：USD',
  `balance` BIGINT COMMENT 'balance after transaction; Unit：USD',
  `k_symbol` TEXT COMMENT '"POJISTNE": stands for insurrance payment
"SLUZBY": stands for payment for statement
"UROK": stands for interest credited
"SANKC. UROK": sanction interest if negative balance
"SIPO": stands for household
"DUCHOD": stands for old-age pension
"UVER": stands for loan payment',
  `bank` TEXT COMMENT 'each bank has unique two-letter code',
  `account` BIGINT
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Please list the account types that are not eligible for loans, and the average income of residents in the district where the account is located exceeds $8000 but is no more than $9000.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T3`.`type`
FROM `district` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `account` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`district_id` = `T2`.`district_id`
INNER JOIN `disp` AS `T3`
  ON `T2`.`account_id` = `T3`.`account_id`
WHERE
  `T3`.`type` <> 'OWNER' AND `T1`.`A11` BETWEEN 8000 AND 9000

【用户问题】
What was the growth rate of the total amount of loans across all accounts for a male client between 1996 and 1997?

```sql
output:
SELECT
  CAST((
    SUM(
      CASE
        WHEN DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T1`.`date` AS DATETIME), '%Y') = '1997'
        THEN `T1`.`amount`
        ELSE 0
      END
    ) - SUM(
      CASE
        WHEN DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T1`.`date` AS DATETIME), '%Y') = '1996'
        THEN `T1`.`amount`
        ELSE 0
      END
    )
  ) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T1`.`date` AS DATETIME), '%Y') = '1996'
      THEN `T1`.`amount`
      ELSE 0
    END
  )
FROM `loan` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `account` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`account_id` = `T2`.`account_id`
INNER JOIN `disp` AS `T3`
  ON `T3`.`account_id` = `T2`.`account_id`
INNER JOIN `client` AS `T4`
  ON `T4`.`client_id` = `T3`.`client_id`
WHERE
  `T4`.`gender` = 'M' AND `T3`.`type` = 'OWNER'

  `district_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'location of branch',
  `A2` TEXT COMMENT 'district_name',
  `A3` TEXT COMMENT 'region',
  `A4` TEXT,
  `A5` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A6` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A7` TEXT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A8` BIGINT COMMENT 'municipality < district < region',
  `A9` BIGINT COMMENT 'not useful',
  `A10` DOUBLE COMMENT 'ratio of urban inhabitants',
  `A11` BIGINT COMMENT 'average salary',
  `A12` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1995',
  `A13` DOUBLE COMMENT 'unemployment rate 1996',
  `A14` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of entrepreneurs per 1000 inhabitants',
  `A15` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1995',
  `A16` BIGINT COMMENT 'no. of committed crimes 1996'
);
CREATE TABLE `loan` (
  `loan_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id number identifying the loan data',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id number identifying the account',
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'the date when the loan is approved',
  `amount` BIGINT COMMENT 'approved amount; unit：US dollar',
  `duration` BIGINT COMMENT 'loan duration; unit：month',
  `payments` DOUBLE COMMENT 'monthly payments; unit：month',
  `status` TEXT COMMENT 'repayment status; A stands for contract finished, no problems;
B stands for contract finished, loan not paid;
C stands for running contract, OK so far;
D stands for running contract, client in debt'
);
CREATE TABLE `order` (
  `order_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'identifying the unique order',
  `account_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number of account',
  `bank_to` TEXT COMMENT 'bank of the recipient',
  `account_to` BIGINT COMMENT 'account of the recipient; each bank has unique two-letter code',
  `amount` DOUBLE COMMENT 'debited amount',
  `k_symbol` TEXT COMMENT 'purpose of the payment; "POJISTNE" stands for insurance payment
"SIPO" stands for household payment
"LEASING" stands for leasing
"UVER" stands for loan payment'
);
CREATE TABLE `trans` (
  `trans_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'transaction id',
  `account_id` BIGINT,
  `date` TEXT COMMENT 'date of transaction',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT '+/- transaction; "PRIJEM" stands for credit
"VYDAJ" stands for withdrawal',
  `operation` TEXT COMMENT 'mode of transaction; "VYBER KARTOU": credit card withdrawal
"VKLAD": credit in cash
"PREVOD Z UCTU" :collection from another bank
"VYBER": withdrawal in cash
"PREVOD NA UCET": remittance to another bank',
  `amount` BIGINT COMMENT 'amount of money; Unit：USD',
  `balance` BIGINT COMMENT 'balance after transaction; Unit：USD',
  `k_symbol` TEXT COMMENT '"POJISTNE": stands for insurrance payment
"SLUZBY": stands for payment for statement
"UROK": stands for interest credited
"SANKC. UROK": sanction interest if negative balance
"SIPO": stands for household
"DUCHOD": stands for old-age pension
"UVER": stands for loan payment',
  `bank` TEXT COMMENT 'each bank has unique two-letter code',
  `account` BIGINT
);

【参考信息】


【用户问题】
Provide the IDs and age of the client with high level credit card, which is eligible for loans.

```sql
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`client_id`,
  DATE_FORMAT(CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS DATETIME), '%Y') - DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T3`.`birth_date` AS DATETIME), '%Y')
FROM `disp` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `card` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`disp_id` = `T1`.`disp_id`
INNER JOIN `client` AS `T3`
  ON `T1`.`client_id` = `T3`.`client_id`
WHERE
  `T2`.`type` = 'gold' AND `T1`.`type` = 'OWNER'

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
统计各个玩法上线首周留存情况
输出：玩法、上线首周首次玩的日期、第几天留存（0,1,2...7)、玩法留存用户数

各玩法首周上线日期：
"广域战场": "20240723",
"消灭战": "20230804",
"幻想混战": "20241115",
"荒野传说": "20240903",
"策略载具": "20241010",
"炎夏混战": "20240625",
"单人装备": "20240517",
"交叉堡垒": "20240412"

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di` (
  `dtstatdate` TEXT COMMENT '统计日期格式YYYYMMDD',
  `vgameappid` TEXT COMMENT '账号体系：wx:微信，qq：手Q',
  `platid` BIGINT COMMENT '系统平台：0:IOS,1:Android',
  `vplayerid` TEXT COMMENT '玩家ID',
  `mode` BIGINT COMMENT '模式ID',
  `modename` TEXT COMMENT '模式名称',
  `submode` BIGINT COMMENT '子模式ID',
  `submodename` TEXT COMMENT '子模式名称',
  `map` BIGINT COMMENT '地图ID',
  `mapname` TEXT COMMENT '地图名称',
  `seasonid` BIGINT COMMENT '赛季ID',
  `seasonname` TEXT COMMENT '赛季名称',
  `roundcnt` BIGINT COMMENT '当日对局数',
  `roundtime` BIGINT COMMENT '当日对局时长(秒)',
  `survivaltime` BIGINT COMMENT '当日存活时长(秒)',
  `firstroundtime` TEXT COMMENT '当日首次对局时间',
  `device_type` BIGINT COMMENT '设备类型'
);

【参考信息】
说明：
广域战场 （2024/7/23）submodename= '广域战场模式'，
消灭战（2023/8/4） modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%消灭战模式%'，
幻想混战（2024/11/15）modename='创意创作间' and submodename='幻想混战'，
荒野传说（2024-09-03）modename='休闲模式' and submodename in ('荒野传说','荒野沙漠')，
策略载具（2024-10-10）modename='休闲模式' and submodename like '%策略载具%'，
炎夏混战（2024-06-25）modename='创意创作间' and submodename like '%炎夏混战%'，
单人装备（2024.5.17）modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%单人装备%'，
交叉堡垒（2024.4.12） modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%交叉堡垒%'

第几天留存：0表示当天参与、1表示当天参与在第2天也参与、2表示当天参与在第3天也参与，依此类推

【用户问题】
统计各个玩法上线首周留存情况
输出：玩法、上线首周首次玩的日期、第几天留存（0,1,2...7)、玩法留存用户数

各玩法首周上线日期：
"广域战场": "20240723",
"消灭战": "20230804",
"幻想混战": "20241115",
"荒野传说": "20240903",
"策略载具": "20241010",
"炎夏混战": "20240625",
"单人装备": "20240517",
"交叉堡垒": "20240412"

```sql
output:
select  a.itype,
        a.dtstatdate,
        datediff(b.dtstatdate,a.dtstatdate) as idaynum,
        count(distinct a.vplayerid)           as iusernum
from (                      
    select
        itype,
        min(dtstatdate) as dtstatdate,
        vplayerid
    from  (
        select '广域战场'      as itype,
                min(dtstatdate) as dtstatdate,
                vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240723' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240723',6)
        and submodename = '广域战场模式'
        group by vplayerid

        union all
        select '消灭战', min(dtstatdate), vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20230804' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20230804',6)
        and modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%消灭战模式%'
        group by vplayerid

        union all
        select '幻想混战', min(dtstatdate), vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20241115' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20241115',6)
        and modename='创意创作间' and submodename='幻想混战'
        group by vplayerid

        union all
        select '荒野传说', min(dtstatdate), vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240903' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240903',6)
        and modename='休闲模式' and submodename in ('荒野传说','荒野沙漠')
        group by vplayerid

        union all
        select '策略载具', min(dtstatdate), vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20241010' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20241010',6)
        and modename='休闲模式' and submodename like '%策略载具%'
        group by vplayerid

        union all
        select '炎夏混战', min(dtstatdate), vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240625' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240625',6)
        and modename='创意创作间' and submodename like '%炎夏混战%'
        group by vplayerid

        union all
        select '单人装备', min(dtstatdate), vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240517' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240517',6)
        and modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%单人装备%'
        group by vplayerid

        union all
        select '交叉堡垒', min(dtstatdate), vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240412' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240412',6)
        and modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%交叉堡垒%'
        group by vplayerid
    ) t
    group by itype, vplayerid
) a
left join (
        select '广域战场' as itype, dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240723' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240723',13)
          and submodename = '广域战场模式'
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid

        union all
        select '消灭战', dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20230804' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20230804',13)
          and modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%消灭战模式%'
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid

        union all
        select '幻想混战', dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20241115' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20241115',13)
          and modename='创意创作间' and submodename='幻想混战'
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid

        union all
        select '荒野传说', dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240903' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240903',13)
          and modename='休闲模式' and submodename in ('荒野传说','荒野沙漠')
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid

        union all
        select '策略载具', dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20241010' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20241010',13)
          and modename='休闲模式' and submodename like '%策略载具%'
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid

        union all
        select '炎夏混战', dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240625' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240625',13)
          and modename='创意创作间' and submodename like '%炎夏混战%'
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid

        union all
        select '单人装备', dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240517' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240517',13)
          and modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%单人装备%'
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid

        union all
        select '交叉堡垒', dtstatdate, vplayerid
        from dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
        where dtstatdate >= '20240412' and dtstatdate <= date_add('20240412',13)
          and modename='组队竞技' and submodename like '%交叉堡垒%'
        group by dtstatdate, vplayerid
) b
  on  a.itype      = b.itype
and  a.vplayerid    = b.vplayerid
where datediff(b.dtstatdate,a.dtstatdate) between 0 and 7
group by a.itype, a.dtstatdate, datediff(b.dtstatdate,a.dtstatdate);
